Text.Value: You idiot. Don't you do this to me!
Yes, they will.
Someone's going to pay for this.

EditorData.NodeContext: Angrier and angrier. Arka stands up

Text.Value: Do not embarrass yourself. He is gone.
He is gone - returned into the cycle. We can only wish him peace in the next life.
Leave.
The gods have taken him. All you can do is pray.
Now? You wanna talk now?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Arka] strides away holding her drawn Xbow.  Use TIF_F_Rig_SCENE_DEN_Arka_StrideAway_WithXbow <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: SCRIPTING: |She storms back towards the Grove, holding her crossbow.|

Text.Value: End every one of those goblins - make them suffer to avenge your fallen friend.
You idiot. Don't you do this to me!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Mourning over a dead brother on the ground.

Text.Value: Don't lash out. Try to be comforting.
Place your hand on her shoulder.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Attemps to put hand on shoulder

Text.Value: A goblin we captured yesterday. I'm going to kill it.
Keep quiet. Try not to encourage bloodshed, for once.
Stand aside.
No, no, no.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Arka] kneels by a dead Kanon. Can use TIF_F_Rig_SCENE_DEN_Arka_KneelDesperate (IN, LOOP) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: CUSTOM SCENE VIEWER: [Around corpse.] Arka kneels by corpse

Text.Value: How can you look at his body and speak to me of peace?
It's... it's too late. Look at him.
Yes. Good. Go forth in hate.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Arka] draws her Xbow in grief and rage. She's focused on getting revenge. Use TIF_F_Rig_SCENE_DEN_Arka_AggressiveXbow_IN <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Her grief turns to fury. She rises, holding her crossbow.|

Text.Value: He is gone - returned into the cycle. We can only wish him peace in the next life.
Someone help me! Kanon's dying!
It's too late. He's gone.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Looking down at the corpse on the ground.
EditorData.NodeContext: Trying to get her to confront the truth,.

Text.Value: I'll say a blessing to guide his soul.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: |*She looked around the battlefield, moaning at the sight of dead bodies elsewhere, then back to Kanon.*|

Text.Value: They're slaughtering us now!

EditorData.NodeContext: Answering "They'll slaughter us if we leave."

Text.Value: Someone's going to pay for this.
You're... right. There's no point.
Arka, no, wait! What are you doing?

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Arka] strides away to kill the goblin. Use TIF_F_Rig_SCENE_DEN_Arka_StrideAway <LoganP>

Text.Value: Peace? No. The time for peace is over.
Don't be sorry - fetch some help!
Memnos is gone, too. Don't weep - they died well. Heroically.
No, we wouldn't. It's pointless.
No. We've prayed enough. We've lost enough.
W-what?

EditorData.NodeContext: Faltering over the word - didn't know someone was dead.

Text.Value: I'm sorry, Arka.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Arka] kneels by a dead Kanon. Can use TIF_F_Rig_SCENE_DEN_Arka_KneelDesperate (IN, LOOP) <LoganP>

Text.Value: *You shiver at the thought of a radiant future. Goblin and tiefling may reap slaughter upon one another until none remain, if you guide them true.*
You need to avenge this - spill some goblin blood.
He's not breathing. Go find a healer!

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Arka] kneels by a dead Kanon. Can use TIF_F_Rig_SCENE_DEN_Arka_KneelDesperate (IN, LOOP) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: CUSTOM SCENE VIEWER: [Around corpse.] Arka kneels by corpse

Text.Value: Anyone in particular?
We'd like that.

EditorData.NodeContext: Gently, talking to a mourning friend.

Text.Value: I'm sorry. It happened so fast.
Your friends are both dead. Will you be bold and kill? Will they be avenged?
Your friends are dead - both of them. They need to be avenged.
Memnos? Where are you? He's not... he's not breathing!

EditorData.AnimationTags: *DUPE* [Arka] kneels by a dead Kanon. Can use TIF_F_Rig_SCENE_DEN_Arka_KneelDesperate (IN, LOOP) <LoganP>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: CUSTOM SCENE VIEWER: [Around corpse.] Looking around desperately. Arka kneels by corpse

Text.Value: No!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: To Memnos, then to her brother on the ground.

Text.Value: Kanon, Memnos, and soon you, too!
Kanon is dead. And so is Memnos.
They'll slaughter us if we leave. There's nothing we can do.
No. I don't want your godsdamned comfort. I want blood.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Player tries to put his hand on Arka's shoulder.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Interaction between the Player and Arka

Text.Value: He's dead. Stop wasting your time.

Synopsis:
Not critpath. Covers the grieving tiefling pair at the gate and their faceoff with the Captive Goblin. 

At the start of N1196, Arka is aiming a crossbow at Sazza the goblin. The player can step into the path of the shot and convince her not to kill the goblin.
